title: Can any second yearite dm their full first year academic calendar. Also did college start around this time only last year or we guys are very late?

comments.body:
we are like 10-15 days late compared to them  
their orientation was on 26th aug

1. come in DM for this year's academic calendar 

2. Yes, we are very late, Last year they started their bootstrap around end of august or around 25-26 august
ok and when is bootstrap and orientation for our batch?
